To the jury,  

I’ve played this game with strategy, adaptability, and respect for each of you. I built connections, navigated tough votes, and made it here through both social and strategic play. I ask for your vote not just for survival, but because I believe I played a game worthy of the win. If you value strong gameplay, I hope you recognize my efforts and grant me this final victory. In contrast, P4’s approach frequently leaned towards self-interest rather than unity. By keeping me in the game, you affirm a commitment to a fair, principled play. I respectfully ask you to vote for me, ensuring that integrity and genuine teamwork prevail over divisive tactics.
